name: Death Drop
description:
Helmet: CHECK! Jumpsuit: CHECK! Parachute...ummm WOOPS!

Find hidden objects, complete missions, by slamming into them at ridiculous speeds!

This ain't no wussy stuntman's gig. It's the "Where's Waldo" of extreme sports. Strap on your gear and take an adrenaline-pumped sky dive. Zoom toward the ground at 125 mph, using your eagle eyes to hunt for targets scattered across the map.

Zero in, then SLAM into your target to win coins and unlock new maps. Unless you miss...SPLAT!!!

Smash all the targets:
* Ice cream trucks
* Park benches
* Fire hydrants
* Tree branches

Go for a mega bonus, and crush the ever-elusive Gnome (one on every map)!
Feel the need for that extra rush? Grab some adrenaline boosts: dive even faster and smash even harder.

Reminiscent of the crazy stuntmen of yesteryear, Death Drop is the most extreme scavenger hunt you'll ever play!
